column4: I am trying to compile PHP and I get the following error: "C compiler cannot create executables." How can I fix ti?
I am trying to compile PHP and I get the following error: "C compiler cannot create executables." How can I fix ti?
what are you trying to do, there is a good howto on apache/mysql/php at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ApacheMySQLPHP
thanks but I want to compile PHP
this problem seems to occur when i want to compile anything :(
RC1, plus I want to be able to compile apps!
so any ideas as to why it says "C compiler cannot create executables"?
nope :) that's exactly the sort of answer i was looking for
is there any place that tells you these sorts of things? lol
lol ok that will install the essential build packages
yeah i should've looked there really, i always recommend it others :P
